_comment: V2.1.0: Signal weights for Market Intelligence Engine. Weights sum to 1.0.

_notes.scraped: Direct supplier prices - highest trust when coverage is good
_notes.aggregator: Aggregator prices - used for direction/trends only, never displayed
_notes.community: User-submitted delivery prices - starts low (sparse data), increase as density grows
_notes.market: FRED/EIA wholesale market data - reliable baseline, always available

coverage_adjustments._comment: When scraped coverage is sparse, shift weight to market

direction._comment: Week-over-week change thresholds for direction detection

coverage._comment: Data point thresholds for coverage levels

market_state._comment: Weighted direction thresholds for market state

urgency._comment: Tank level thresholds for urgency pre-gate

staleness_decay._comment: Reduce weight by this percentage per 24 hours of staleness

aggregator_caps._comment: Aggregator signals are capped for safety
